definition: dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: A Roget's Thesaurus will do the trick, as will any number of vocabulary building books.
sentences.chinese: 一本羅熱辭典或者其它詞彙書就可以幫你做到這一點。

sentences.english: Some dictionary writer use citation to show what word mean.
sentences.chinese: 有些辭典的編纂者用引文作例證以解釋詞義。

sentences.english: Now I have five English dictionaries and two Chinese dictionaries.
sentences.chinese: 我有五本英語辭典和兩本漢語詞典。

sentences.english: When he writes , he always keeps a dictionary at hand.
sentences.chinese: 他寫作時，手邊總是有本辭典。

sentences.english: The computerized talking dictionary, unparalleled in the world, is. a good assis. ant for your successful career.
sentences.chinese: 真人發聲電腦辭典，獨步天下，事業成功好幫手。

sentences.english: Electrons are negatively charged with electricity;
sentences.chinese: 他在電腦裏有電子辭典。

sentences.english: Kanwa dictionary is a main kind of Japanese philological dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 漢和辭典是日本語文詞典的一個主要門類。

sentences.english: The viewer supports multiple dictionaries installed at a time.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆支持多種電腦辭典安裝於時間。

sentences.english: As a language student, you can never be come too much attached to dictionaries.
sentences.chinese: 作爲學習語言的學生，決不要過分依敕辭典。

sentences.english: What I want to know is it will be important to use ane-dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道的是使用電子辭典是否將會很重要。

sentences.english: He is using that electronic dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 他正在使用那個電子辭典。

sentences.english: Techniques using lexicons for content interpretation are yet to come.
sentences.chinese: 使用辭典作爲滿足的解釋技術還在後頭。

sentences.english: 'The Oxford Dictionary' is the best authority on English words.
sentences.chinese: 《牛津英語大辭典》是英語詞彙的最高權威。

sentences.english: Thee-dictionary needs a lot of memory.
sentences.chinese: 電子辭典需佔用很大的內存。

sentences.english: The publication of the new dictionary is one of the cultural event of the year.
sentences.chinese: 這本新辭典的出版是今年文化界的一件大事。

definition: dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
